trans-unit.source: MicroPython library for SSD1327 based OLED displays.
trans-unit.target: Biblioteca de MicroPython para pantallas OLED basadas en SSD1327.

trans-unit.source: This library lets you update SSD1327 based 128x128 4-bit grayscale OLED displays.
trans-unit.target: Esta biblioteca le permite actualizar las pantallas OLED en escala de grises de 4 bits basadas en SSD1327 128x128.
